TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PnrpPeerResolverBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerResolverBindingElement

summary.span: 定义用于创建对等名称解析协议 (PNRP) 对等解析程序的绑定元素。

span.span: Defines the binding element used to create a Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRP) peer resolver.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要从此类的实例创建对等解析程序，请在构造实例后调用 。To create a peer resolver from an instance of this class, call after the instance has been constructed.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

summary.span: 创建一个通道工厂，该工厂可创建用于发送消息的通道。

span.span: Creates a channel factory that can be used to create a channel for sending messages.

returns.span: ，包含指定类型的新通道工厂。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取通道工厂，以基于传输绑定元素的配置发送消息。This method can be used to get a channel factory for sending messages based on the configuration of the transport binding element.
